content:
I think I accidentally cut you off! It seems like you were about to suggest some additional ideas for creating a more sustainable morning routine.

Please, do go on! I'm interested in hearing more about how I can prioritize self-care and relaxation in my morning routine. What are some simple yet effective ways to incorporate more relaxation and calm into my morning?

Also, I like the idea of a "no phone zone" in the morning. I can see how it would help me start the day more mindfully. Do you have any tips on how to make this habit stick?
